<noinclude>
This template creates a note/info box for highlighting important information.

== Usage ==
<pre>
{{Note|Your note text here}}
{{Note|title=Short title|Detailed body text}}
</pre>

== Parameters ==
* '''1''' - The note text (required unless title is given)
* '''title''' - Optional title text

[[Category:Templates]]
</noinclude><includeonly><div class="df-admonition df-note">{{#if:{{{title|}}}|'''ℹ️ Note: {{{title}}}''' {{{1|}}}|'''ℹ️ Note:''' {{{1}}}}}</div></includeonly>
